subject: Track and Field
Steroids
lead_paragraph: A French distance runner, Laila Traby, underwent a doping test after the police found the banned performance-enhancer erythropoietin in her apartment in the Pyrenees and held her in custody, the French Athletics Federation said.
snippet: A French distance runner, Laila Traby, underwent a doping test after the police found the banned performance-enhancer erythropoietin in her apartment in the Pyrenees and held her in custody, the French Athletics Federation said.
